poem:
**Contagion of our Time**

In the pages of power,  
words germinate like seeds—  
RFK Jr, his voice  
a vaccine of rhetoric,  
glosses over,  
amidst the hum of containment.

Silent beneath,  
a world trembles,  
unseen as viruses  
in crowded hollows.  
Yet hope murmurs:  
what can be  
when leaders  
calm the storm.
